short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves readability of Hacker News comments by slightly increasing text size and capping the maximum line width.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Readable Hacker News Comments provides minor readability improvements to Y Combinator's Hacker News forum while maintaining the minimalist styling. Improvements include a slight text size increase and a decrease in line width.

This extension is not affiliated with Hacker News or Y Combinator in any official capacity.
